title:
15h08 - Repair and servicing of
vehicles.
text:
Contracts for the repair and
servicing of vehicles are generally subject to the CWHSSA and are not exempt
under the open market exemption. (See FOH 15i00(4).)
html: Contracts for the repair and servicing of vehicles are generally subject to the CWHSSA and are not exempt under the open market exemption. (See FOH 15i00(4).)
